text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Implement graphic and animated elements for The Sports Group including...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
